recommendations.title: üö® Critical Accessibility & Functionality Issues
recommendations.description: Address missing alt attributes, navigation hamburger menus, and language switcher problems immediately.
recommendations.impact: These issues prevent basic functionality and accessibility compliance across all devices.
implementationSteps: Add alt attributes to all images
Implement hamburger menu for mobile navigation
Add language switcher to all pages
Test keyboard navigation and screen readers

recommendations.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Bootstrap Responsive Framework Implementation
recommendations.description: Systematically add Bootstrap responsive classes (.img-fluid, .btn, .form-control) across all components.
recommendations.impact: Significantly improves responsive behavior and ensures consistent styling across all breakpoints.
implementationSteps: Add .img-fluid to all images
Apply .btn classes to all buttons
Use .form-control for all form inputs
Implement responsive grid with .col-sm-*, .col-md-*, .col-lg-*

recommendations.title: üè• Medical Equipment Mobile Optimization
recommendations.description: Enhance medical equipment galleries and service displays for mobile clinic decision-makers.
recommendations.impact: Critical for healthcare professionals viewing equipment specifications on mobile devices.
implementationSteps: Implement responsive equipment image galleries
Add mobile-optimized carousels for equipment photos
Optimize service descriptions with collapsible content
Ensure clinic contact information is mobile-clickable

recommendations.title: üáÆüá± Hebrew RTL Layout Enhancement
recommendations.description: Implement comprehensive RTL support for Hebrew-speaking medical professionals.
recommendations.impact: Essential for Israeli medical equipment market and Hebrew-speaking healthcare providers.
implementationSteps: Replace left/right classes with start/end alternatives
Add Hebrew font support to CSS
Test RTL layout with dir="rtl" attribute
Ensure language switcher works in both directions

recommendations.title: ‚ö° Mobile Performance Optimization
recommendations.description: Optimize loading performance for mobile clinic environments with potentially slower connections.
recommendations.impact: Improves user experience and reduces bounce rate for mobile users.
implementationSteps: Optimize and compress equipment images
Implement lazy loading for image galleries
Minimize font loading with font-display: swap
Use CSS Grid and Flexbox for efficient layouts

tasks: ‚úÖ Add hamburger menu to all pages
‚úÖ Add alt attributes to all images
‚úÖ Make contact information clickable on mobile
testingRequirements: Test on iPhone Safari and Android Chrome
Verify carousel functionality on touch devices
Test with actual medical equipment images
Test RTL layout with Hebrew content
